item.title: AKoM - All Kinds of Materials (2015) by Patrick Housen
item.description:
AKoM - All Kinds of Materials (2015) by Patrick Housen

Mixed Ensemble that clashes high & low brow. Classical instruments vs drums and electronic bass

item.title: Maze by Patrick Housen
item.description:
Maze by Patrick Housen

Live recording of Maze Maze (2012) is a piece I've written for - the celebration of An Pierl√© as composer of the city of Ghent 2013. It had it's debut performance by Headliner @ 'Week van de Hedendaagse Muziek' in Ghent on 27/03/13 Link to facebook page of Headliner: http://tinyurl.com/cekm2uj - Go check these guys out!

item.title: HomebushBay
item.description:
HomebushBay

Homebush Bay revolves around the atmosphere of loneliness and confusion. There are no clear borders between reality, dream and recollection. It is a quest for land in an infinite ocean, with crickets as the only support, and the memory of what once was ...

unruhig

item.title: ingedachtenverdronken

ingedachtenverdronken

eindwerk 2e bachelor Over frustraties en depressie en gevangen zitten in je gedachten. 2nd Bachelor film About depression, and being lost in thoughts. Music...

item.title: Musica Futurista (2) by MATRIX New Music Centre
item.description:
Musica Futurista (2) by MATRIX New Music Centre

Some results of our workshop 'Musica Futurista' at Jeugdhuis Den Eglantier, Sint-Niklaas (BE). 'Musica Futurista' is a workshop series on experimental musical instruments, developed by MATRIX New Music Centre Special thanks to Mattias Parent (Logos Foundation) and Patrick Housen (composer) More info: www.matrix-new-music.be/musica-futurista

item.title: Erfgoeddag met thema Grenzeloos op 27 april in Vlaanderen & Brussel
item.description:
Erfgoeddag met thema Grenzeloos op 27 april in Vlaanderen & Brussel

Meer dan 500 musea, archieven en tal van lokale erfgoedorganisaties verleggen op Erfgoeddag hun grenzen. Ontdek dankzij de honderden gratis activiteiten in Vlaanderen en Brussel alles over de geschiedenis van migratie, het circus- en kermiserfgoed, de evolutie in de cartografie, de vele spannende smokkel- en douaneverhalen, de geschiedenis van het toerisme, enz.

item.title: If You Rust, You Rest.
item.description:
If You Rust, You Rest.

Shortfilm by Franco Geens - Music and sound design by Patrick Housen
